data.name: SOK PRO SEX
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1805270/


About the Game

Sexual Content! Instant access to all 100 levels and to all Girls! SOK PRO SEX is a sokoban classic puzzle game with 18+ adult patch! The goal of the game is to strip all the Girls naked!

Features:
✔️ Instant access to all 100 levels and to all Girls;
✔️ Selectable background color: Sexy Girls;
✔️ New color scheme for levels - pink;
✔️ Undo of a move in case of error;
✔️ Personal statistics & Steam Leaderboards;
✔️ Switch between full screen and windowed mode;
✔️ Convenient and quick selection of the required level;
✔️ Cloud saves;
✔️ Community Hub Walkthrough Guides.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required: Keyboard, Mouse. Supported: 2560x1440/1920x1080 fullscreen. Windowed: 1920x1080/1600x900/1366x768/1280x720/1024x576/854x480/640x360/432x240

content_descriptors.notes: Different girls gradually strip naked over 100 levels. Gradually, there are fewer things on them. At the end, the painted girls are completely naked.
